## Learning goals

1. Understand the basics of bootstrapping -- be able to construct your own bootstrap resamples and calculate a bootstrap CI for a statistic.
1. Make your own bootstraps with loops or functional programming.
1. Combine your own knowledge of R programming techniques with the `boot` package for easy bootstrapping.
1. Use the `rsample` package and advanced R programming techniques to iterate over lists of bootstrap resamples.
